timeline.bodyText: Rather than just renaming the enum entry - it would be better to add the new entry and alias it to the old one so we don't need to do a coordinated merge with the uses in OMR. Once we fix OMR you can do another change to remove the old unused enum entry. This is because there are a few bits of code that are Java specific in OMR that have not been refactored down to OpenJ9.
timeline.author: andrewcraik

timeline.message:
Remove code related to invokeWithArgumentsHelper

MethodHandle.invokeWithArgumentsHelper was removed in: #10859.

This PR removes all dead-code related to invokeWithArgumentsHelper.

Related: #7352

Co-authored-by: Jack Lu <Jack.S.Lu@ibm.com>
Signed-off-by: Babneet Singh <sbabneet@ca.ibm.com>
